segments.text: Hey ! A real cook gets down and dirty . Besides , I think I look good covered in baking mix ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , your making cinnamon toast inspired me to go out and buy a waffle maker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Awesome ! I'm in heaven . Let me help . They're so easy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . You just add milk , eggs and a little oil to the baking mix and stir ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And then you just pour the batter into the waffle iron ...
segments.speaker: S2
